messages.subject: Re: B.C. and other lists
messages.msgSnippet: ... Ha Ha, Brooke!  It s funny you brought the wrist slapping up ... there was just a very long, and actually quite interesting, thread about this this past
messages.messageBody:
>
> Hi there Tina,
> yes ...I was on that ca. list for a year but I found there were too many
> posts coming through and that the vein of discussion was often a waste of
> time for me (and off topic...but that was my opinion and not very welcome
> so I never expressed it..others who did got their wrists slapped). I think
> that there are loads of people who are very informed and some wise
> home-schoolers on that list though.

Ha Ha, Brooke! It's funny you brought the wrist slapping up ... there was just a very long, and actually quite interesting, thread about this this past week on homeschool-ca. The gist of the discussion was that all of what came up on the list reflected people's reality in living life with their
children, and the learning that takes place with the whole mess of it. The wrist slapping turned into a wonderful welcome to a new subscriber!

(I actually subscribe to the digest, so for me the list is pretty manageable.)

I have heard of the wonderful support for hs in the Kootenays (Nelson, in particular). Glad you have that there.

Tina.

>
